text: Afghanistan competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Afghanistan sent two swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Hedayatullah Noorzad |align=left|50 m backstroke |39.09 |73 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m backstroke |1:31.35 |63 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Hamid Rahimi |align=left|50 m freestyle |30.79 |129 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m breaststroke |37.48 |74 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Afghanistan at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Afghan sport
title: Afghanistan at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
